// src/components/PlayerStatistics.tsx import React from 'react'; import '../../styles/PlayerStatistics.css'; import { BarChart, Bar, LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer } from 'recharts'; const battingData = [ { match: 'Match 1', runs: 30, strikeRate: 80 }, { match: 'Match 2', runs: 45, strikeRate: 100 }, { match: 'Match 3', runs: 70, strikeRate: 110 }, { match: 'Match 4', runs: 20, strikeRate: 60 }, ]; const bowlingData = [ { match: 'Match 1', wickets: 1, economy: 5 }, { match: 'Match 2', wickets: 2, economy: 4.5 }, { match: 'Match 3', wickets: 3, economy: 6 }, { match: 'Match 4', wickets: 0, economy: 7 }, ]; const PlayerStatistics: React.FC = () => (

Your Statistics

Batting Statistics

Bowling Statistics

Fielding Statistics

Catches Taken: 5

Run Outs: 2

Stumpings: 1

); export default PlayerStatistics;
